response.original_title: Local H - Whatever Happened To P.J. Soles Shows
response.overview: Immerse yourself in the live concert experience of Local H with this collection of performances spanning different years and venues. Witness the energy of Scott and Brian at Fritz's Corner, the evolution of their songs over 4 years at the Beat Kitchen, and Scott's solo acoustic performance of the album in 2021.  April 6, 2004 (Record Release) Fritz's Corner - Zion, Illinois May 11, 2008 (7 Night Stand) Beat Kitchen - Chicago Illinois December 30, 2021 (NYE acoustic performance) Chicago, Illinois
response.title: Local H - Whatever Happened To P.J. Soles Shows
